channel.title: Help with triggering external synth from Axoloti
channel.description: Hey! I am trying to set up Axoloti to sequence a Waldorf Blofeld. But I havent yet been able to make it work. I have used a simple pulse based sequencer as on the picture. Blofeld seems to be receiving a midi signal, but I am not sure if it is midi notes that Axoloti sends out. Any ideas?

item.title: Help with triggering external synth from Axoloti
item.dc:creator: @anon5189335
item.description:
@anon5189335 wrote:

Thanks technobear. that helped

Read full topic
item.source: Help with triggering external synth from Axoloti

item.title: Help with triggering external synth from Axoloti
item.dc:creator: @thetechnobear Mark Harris
item.description:
@thetechnobear wrote:

but in that example your not setting pitch or velocity

pitch will default to 0 = a4 (?) but velocity 0 , but midi convention velocity 0 is note_off not note_on

so put a dial on both and set some values explicitly

Read full topic
item.source: Help with triggering external synth from Axoloti

item.title: Help with triggering external synth from Axoloti
item.dc:creator: @anon5189335
item.description:
@anon5189335 wrote:

Hey!

I am trying to set up Axoloti to sequence a Waldorf Blofeld. But I havent yet been able to make it work. I have used a simple pulse based sequencer as on the picture. Blofeld seems to be receiving a midi signal, but I am not sure if it is midi notes that Axoloti sends out.

Any ideas?
